com.github.makiftutuncu.shoppingcart

Class ShoppingCart

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.makiftutuncu.shoppingcart.ShoppingCart

  • public class ShoppingCart
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a shopping cart to which Products, Campaigns, Coupons can be added.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShoppingCart(DeliveryCostCalculator deliveryCostCalculator)
      Creates a shopping cart

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ShoppingCart addCampaigns(Campaign campaign, Campaign... otherCampaigns)
      Adds one or more campaigns to the cart
      ShoppingCart addCoupons(Coupon coupon, Coupon... otherCoupons)
      Adds one or more coupons to the cart
      ShoppingCart addProduct(Product product, int quantity)
      Adds a product of given quantity to the cart, if it is added before, increases the quantity
      int[] calculateAmounts()
      Calculates cart total, total campaign discounts and total coupon discounts by processing all items in the cart
      int campaignDiscount()
      Calculates total campaign discounts by processing all items in the cart
      int couponDiscount()
      Calculates total coupon discounts by processing all items in the cart
      int deliveryCost()
      Calculates delivery cost for the items in the cart
      java.util.Optional<Campaign> findBestCampaignFor(Category category)
      Finds campaign that makes the most discount for given category
      java.util.Optional<Coupon> findBestCoupon(int cartAmount)
      Finds coupon that makes the most discount for given cart amount
      void print()
      Prints out categories of items with their quantities and prices, applied discounts by campaigns and coupons, delivery cost and the final amount of the cart
      java.lang.String toString() 
      int totalAmountAfterDiscounts()
      Calculates cart total after applying total campaign discounts and total coupon discounts by processing all items in the cart

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • addProduct

        public ShoppingCart addProduct(Product product,
                               int quantity)
        Adds a product of given quantity to the cart, if it is added before, increases the quantity
        Parameters:
        product - Product to add, cannot be null
        quantity - Quantity to add, must be positive
        Returns:
        Shopping cart itself after adding for chaining

      • addCampaigns

        public ShoppingCart addCampaigns(Campaign campaign,
                                 Campaign... otherCampaigns)
        Adds one or more campaigns to the cart
        Parameters:
        campaign - A campaign to add, cannot be null
        otherCampaigns - Variable number of other campaigns to add, cannot be null or contain null campaigns
        Returns:
        Shopping cart itself after adding for chaining

      • addCoupons

        public ShoppingCart addCoupons(Coupon coupon,
                               Coupon... otherCoupons)
        Adds one or more coupons to the cart
        Parameters:
        coupon - A coupon to add, cannot be null
        otherCoupons - Variable number of other coupons to add, cannot be null or contain null coupons
        Returns:
        Shopping cart itself after adding for chaining

      • calculateAmounts

        public int[] calculateAmounts()
        Calculates cart total, total campaign discounts and total coupon discounts by processing all items in the cart
        Returns:
        An int array of size 3 containing cart total, total campaign discounts and total coupon discounts respectively

      • campaignDiscount

        public int campaignDiscount()
        Calculates total campaign discounts by processing all items in the cart
        Returns:
        Total campaign discounts

      • couponDiscount

        public int couponDiscount()
        Calculates total coupon discounts by processing all items in the cart
        Returns:
        Total coupon discounts

      • totalAmountAfterDiscounts

        public int totalAmountAfterDiscounts()
        Calculates cart total after applying total campaign discounts and total coupon discounts by processing all items in the cart
        Returns:
        Cart total after applying total campaign discounts and total coupon discounts

      • deliveryCost

        public int deliveryCost()
        Calculates delivery cost for the items in the cart
        Returns:
        Delivery cost

      • findBestCampaignFor

        public java.util.Optional<Campaign> findBestCampaignFor(Category category)
        Finds campaign that makes the most discount for given category
        Parameters:
        category - Category for which best campaign is sought
        Returns:
        Best campaign optionally if found or `Optional.empty()`

      • findBestCoupon

        public java.util.Optional<Coupon> findBestCoupon(int cartAmount)
        Finds coupon that makes the most discount for given cart amount
        Parameters:
        cartAmount - Cart amount for which best coupon is sought
        Returns:
        Best coupon optionally if found or `Optional.empty()`

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints out categories of items with their quantities and prices, applied discounts by campaigns and coupons, delivery cost and the final amount of the cart
